```{r}
library(tidyverse) 
library(psych)
library(psychTools)
```

```{r}
aquifer_prop <- readr::read_tsv(here::here("data", "stats", "aquifer_properties.txt"))


# Remove % string
aquifer_prop$perc_change <- gsub("%", "", aquifer_prop$perc_change)

# Make column (perc_change) numeric 
aquifer_prop$perc_change <- as.numeric(aquifer_prop$perc_change)

```

Describe data 

```{r}

```

